name: MIGHT (itch) (Vanillach3rries)
description:
MIGHT is a third-person action adventure game where the player controls the little mouse "Poe" who tries to save the world from evil shadow creatures who want to steal every last drop of light left.

Use attacks, to destroy your foes, as you progress through the game, but make sure to never leave your light companion's side for too long, or your light will fade too...

Be the one who restores the light!

This game can be played both with a controller and keyboard, but we strongly advice to use a contoller.

Controls (Controller):

Left Joystick: Move

A : Dash, 

X: Slash (in quick succession to double slash); 

Hold/Release RT: Shoot (Move left stick to aim)
